title: Add rest timer, workout plans, and age-accessible interface improvements

requirements.text: Add a rest timer feature that allows users to set and track rest periods of 1-2 minutes between sets during workout logging

quotes: Maintain the add 1 or 2 min rest time per set

acceptanceCriteria: Users can start a rest timer after completing a set
Timer displays countdown from 1 or 2 minutes (user selectable)
Visual and/or audio notification when rest period completes
Timer integrates seamlessly into the WorkoutLogger component

requirements.text: Create a workout plan management system where users can create, save, and follow structured workout plans instead of only logging individual workouts
acceptanceCriteria: Users can create named workout plans with predefined exercises, sets, and reps
Users can view a list of their saved workout plans
Users can select a workout plan to follow during workout logging
Backend stores workout plans with stable types and CRUD operations

requirements.text: Design the interface to be accessible and intuitive for users aged 10-60 years with appropriate font sizes, contrast ratios, and simplified navigation patterns

quotes: change like anyone use 10 to 60 years person

acceptanceCriteria: Font sizes are large enough for readability (minimum 16px base)
Color contrast meets WCAG AA standards
Navigation is straightforward with clear labels and icons
Interactive elements have sufficient touch target sizes (minimum 44x44px)

requirements.text: Add a home workout category to the exercise library with bodyweight exercises suitable for home training without equipment
acceptanceCriteria: Exercise library includes a 'Home Workout' muscle group category
Category contains at least 10 bodyweight exercises (push-ups, squats, planks, etc.)
Users can filter exercises to show only home workout options
Backend Exercise type supports categorization for home workouts

constraints: Maintain the existing single-actor backend architecture
Do not modify immutable frontend paths: useInternetIdentity hooks, useActor.ts, main.tsx, components/ui
Preserve existing workout logging, history, and exercise library functionality
nonGoals: Video content streaming or storage (membership video feature deferred)
Payment processing or subscription billing integration
App store publishing or mobile native app conversion

required: Rest timer icon with stopwatch design in energetic orange theme (rest-timer-icon.dim_64x64.png)
Workout plan icon showing stacked documents or checklist (workout-plan-icon.dim_64x64.png)
Home workout icon with house and fitness symbols (home-workout-icon.dim_64x64.png)
